name: journey

journey noun [C]
(TRIP)
Add to word list
Add to word list
A2 the act of travelling from one place to another, especially in a vehicle: I love going on long journeys. We broke our journey (= stopped for a short time) in Jacksonville before travelling on to Miami the next day. Have a safe journey!figurative He views his life as a spiritual journey towards a greater understanding of his faith.mainly UK Did you have a good journey?mainly UK It's a two-hour train journey from York to London.
